entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Fort McMurray
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:17 AM MST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -11.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort McMurray Airport 02:00 AM MST Friday 30 December 2022
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -11.8°C
Pressure: 100.4 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -13.8°C
Wind: E 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening then partly cloudy. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 12.
